gw.wsi.pl

Class ZoneImportAPI

  • gw.wsi.pl.ZoneImportAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class ZoneImportAPI
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    IZoneImportAPI is a remote interface to a set of tools to import zone data (in csv format) into the staging tables. See documentation for the zone data csv format.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZoneImportAPI()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearProductionTables(String countryCode)
      Clears the production tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported from the staging tables via the Table Import Tools. This should be called after the staging tables have gone through an integrity check and any offending rows are excluded/corrected.
      void clearStagingTables(String countryCode)
      Clears the staging tables tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported to the staging tables. If countryCode is specified and is a valid value, only rows for that country are cleared.
      int importToStaging(String countryCode, String zoneData, boolean clearStaging)
      Import csv formatted data containg zone information. See the documentation for details of the expected csv format. This gives you the option of clearing out the staging tables before loading the data.

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZoneImportAPI

        ZoneImportAPI()

    • Method Detail

      • importToStaging

        int importToStaging(String countryCode,
                  String zoneData,
                  boolean clearStaging)
        Import csv formatted data containg zone information. See the documentation for details of the expected csv format. This gives you the option of clearing out the staging tables before loading the data.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - the code for the country to which this data belongs
        zoneData - The data to import, passed as a String.
        clearStaging - Clears the staging tables before doing the import, this only clears the staging tables of the data for the specified country, if all data needs to be cleared, use table import instead
        Returns:

      • clearProductionTables

        void clearProductionTables(String countryCode)
        Clears the production tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported from the staging tables via the Table Import Tools. This should be called after the staging tables have gone through an integrity check and any offending rows are excluded/corrected.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - a valid country code that has a zone configuartion defined or null. A null value here will clear all zone information.

      • clearStagingTables

        void clearStagingTables(String countryCode)
        Clears the staging tables tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported to the staging tables. If countryCode is specified and is a valid value, only rows for that country are cleared.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - a valid country code or null. A null value here will clear all zone information.
